knimeNode.name: HiLite Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node hilites all rows of the incoming data table.

fullDescription.intro: This node hilites all incoming data rows and passes the hilite information to all down- and upstream nodes.
fullDescription.option: If checked, hilite information is cleared before execution. This will trigger a global hilite event on the input hilite handler removing all hiliting before execution of the node.
